overview: Jasper Carrott stars as Sago, on holiday in Spain with his two friends Wayne and Kevin.  After nearly missing their plane, Sago ends up losing all of the trio's money in a game of backgammon, and enters them into a talent contest to try to win some back. They are the stereotypical British tourist in the sun: uncouth, rowdy, obnoxious, and more often than not, drunk!
title: Carrott Del Sol
